Layer.Text: Visit the original DWI Site!: :: http://dwi.ddruk.com

Layer.LoadBackgroundCommand: %function(self) if Song1:GetSongDir() then if Song1:GetBackgroundPath() then if Song1:GetBackgroundPath() == nil then self:Load( ThemeFile('Common fallback background') ) else self:Load( Song1:GetBackgroundPath() ) end else self:Load( ThemeFile('Common fallback background') ) end else self:Load( ThemeFile('Common fallback background') ) end self:zoomto(250,250,0,0) end

%function(self) if Song2:GetSongDir() then if Song2:GetBackgroundPath() then if Song2:GetBackgroundPath() == nil then self:Load( ThemeFile('Common fallback background') ) else self:Load( Song2:GetBackgroundPath() ) end else self:Load( ThemeFile('Common fallback background') ) end else self:Load( ThemeFile('Common fallback background') ) end self:zoomto(250,250,0,0) end

Layer.ShowLastBitCommand: %function(self) local Pr = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() RandomNumber = math.random(1,2) if Pr.DWIAnnouncer then if RandomNumber == 1 then AudioPlay('Internal/credits/pass-00') elseif RandomNumber == 2 then AudioPlay('Internal/credits/pass-04') else AudioPlay('Internal/credits/pass-00') end end end
